sentences.en: British title of nobility into Duke, Marquis, Earl, Viscount and Baron grade 5.
sentences.cn: 英国贵族爵位分为公爵 、 侯爵 、 伯爵 、 子爵和男爵5个等级.

sentences.en: It was said that the moment she saw the viscount she fell in love with him.
sentences.cn: 听说她对子爵一见倾心.

sentences.en: Park on the left side of the Viscount.
So is this all right to welcome the viscount and his nephew?
sentences.cn: 我这样接见子爵和他的侄子还合适吧?

sentences.en: Take these flowers into the anteroom or dressing - room,'said the viscount. "
sentences.cn: “ 把这些花搬到前厅更衣室去, ” 子爵说.

sentences.en: The cook was dressing some fowls for the viscount's dinner.
sentences.cn: 当时厨子正在宰杀家禽为子爵做晚饭.

sentences.en: The girl was brought to the kitchen of the chateau of Viscount d'Epinoy.
sentences.cn: 小女孩被带到德埃皮努瓦子爵城堡的厨房里.

sentences.en: The Viscount d'Epinoy was the first of several dignitaries to take up the savage girl's cause.
sentences.cn: 德埃皮努瓦子爵是最早收养这个野女孩的权贵之一.

sentences.en: The viscount disembarked its passagers at the airport.
sentences.cn: 子爵号飞机在机场下客.

sentences.en: Used as a form of address for a marquis, an earl, or a viscount.
sentences.cn: 勋爵用作侯爵 、 伯爵或子爵的称呼.

sentences.en: Viscount Bagwig, our excellent ambassador, paid her marked attention.
sentences.cn: 我们尊贵的大使巴格威格子爵对她另眼相看.

words.tran_cn: 子爵的身份；子爵的头衔
子爵的管辖区；身份；地位；头衔

trans.tran_en: a British nobleman with a rank between that of an earl and a baron
